name: Grow grow, meet god
description:
In an effort to find god, you decide to grow a tree large enough to reach into the clouds.

How to play:

Find water pots to water your tree with, then climb the tree in order to find god.

Help:

Pot 1 and 2 can be emptied at the bottom of the tree, pot 3 has to be emptied at the top of the tree canopy.

Controls: 

WSAD: Move

Space: Jump

E: Pick up pot / water tree
